text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Narita, Narita, Narita! It's Narita Brian! Narita Brian is gaining a huge 
lead!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: And Narita Brian takes first!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Nothing could stop Narita Brian's power!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The lead racers were neck and neck, but the amazing Narita Brian 
broke out ahead and took the win!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Not only was it a Satsuki Sho record, she set a new top time for the 
2,000-meter Nakayama track!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
What a heart-pounding race! The thunder of applause from the stands 
won't stop!

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: Wha… What was that explosion on the final stretch?!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text:
This is a G1 race, but those other racers looked like toddlers! I had no 
idea Narita Brian was so strong!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
A landslide three-length lead, with a course record to boot. How can 
she look dissatisfied after that?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: You're such a greedy little sister, Brian.
It was a stunning victory at the prestigious Classic race.
That's how Narita Brian came to be called the strongest.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Exhale…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hup!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Whoo, Brian's outta this world… She's beating her time every single 
lap.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I know she ran an amazing race in the Satsuki Sho, but who would've 
thought she had this much more potential.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Look at that—even the onlookers are standing there dumbstruck.

She shoots past our expectations every run. I've had to revamp her 
training routine over and over.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hmph…
Nice going, Brian. You're getting comfortable with that running style.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Low center of gravity, right? I heard you thought it up together when 
you scouted her.

I gave her some advice, but she's the one who made it work. I was 
blown away the first time I saw it.

I gave her some advice, but she's the one who made it work. I was 
blown away the first time I saw it.
All right, let's finish off with one more lap.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Just one? Then I'll take it seriously. Get that stopwatch ready.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Say what? You weren't serious this whole time?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: You may need to redo that training routine again.
Looks like it…

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Excuse me, Ms. Brian! Do you have time for a quick question?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Whoa, what the heck?! We're in the middle of training here!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
I'm so sorry, but I had to try during your training. I couldn't get a 
chance otherwise!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
If it means that much to you… I've got you covered! What's your 
question?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Thanks, team. I'll let you handle it. I'm making my run.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Aaah, wait! Just one thing!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
You ran a beautiful race at the Satsuki Sho, but what's next for you? 
Will you try to become the fifth ever Triple Crown champion?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: That's just a stop on the road.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: A stop? H-hey, what exactly do you mean?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Exactly as she said.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Winning the Triple Crown will not satisfy her.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I thought I'd find you here.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: There's a flood of reporters looking to catch you after training.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Big Sis…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Most would've run out of energy during the last stretch of that 
fast-paced Satsuki Sho.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Nevertheless, you met the challenge, and when everyone else ran out 
of steam, you shot through to victory.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: It's no wonder you've thrown the world into an uproar.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I didn't mean to do anything special. It didn't feel particularly fast to 
me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I know all too well there are racers out there who could've run faster.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You've shown the racing world an explosive win, but you still don't 
seem happy.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I wonder when exactly that appetite of yours will be sated.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I suggest you use the back entrance to the dorms. There aren't any 
reporters on that side.
